# AppImage Re-Signer Project

This project provides tools for removing and adding GPG signatures to Linux AppImage files.

## Project Type
Python application for AppImage signature management

## Key Features
- Remove existing GPG signatures from AppImages
- Sign AppImages with custom GPG keys
- Verify AppImage signatures
- GPG key management (import/export)
- Support for detached ASCII-armor signatures (.asc)

## Development Guidelines
- Use python-gnupg library for GPG operations
- Follow PEP 8 coding standards
- Include comprehensive error handling
- Document all functions and modules
- Support both CLI and programmatic usage
